snippet: Torn by violence and poverty, residents of the Kenilworth-Parkside neighborhood in the nation's capital were leery when the DC Promise Neighborhood Initiative promised to tackle generational poverty in a new way....

headline.print_headline: What to Know About Promised Neighborhoods
headline.main: What to Know About Promised Neighborhoods

lead_paragraph: Torn by violence and poverty, residents of the Kenilworth-Parkside neighborhood in the nation's capital were leery when the DC Promise Neighborhood Initiative promised to tackle generational poverty in a new way.
